name: Risk Of Rain - Student Project
description:
Presented by NYU Game Center Summer 2022 Intermediate Game Development Risk of Rain 1 Team 

Fight on a mysterious planet with randomly spawning enemies and bosses. Unlock chests for items to boost your stats and locate the teleporter to fight the boss! 

_____________________

A student project inspired by Risk of Rain by Hopoo Games: https://store.steampowered.com/app/248820/Risk_of_Rain/ 

Controls

  • Use ↑↓→← to move around
  • 𝐙𝐗𝐂𝐕 for abilities
  • [𝐄𝐒𝐂] to see pause menu, toggle volume, quick reference for all controls 

Credits

Allyson Chan/TinyBitOfHeaven: Item & Enemy Programmer, Sound Designer, Animation Programmer  (https://tinybitofheaven.itch.io)

Arnee Wen/asaagohan: UI Engineer, Visual & Environment Designer  (https://asagohan.itch.io)

Zejun Zhao/Trigon: Player Programmer, Sound Designer (https://trigon1015.itch.io)

Game Design decisions were collaborative: We had to make several important decisions for downscoping the source material.
